attributes.title: They killed my pet rock!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
attributes.review: I can not believe the audacity of the creators of this app. I downloaded it and I was immediately barraged with government figures at my door. They took my ramen noodles, my anime body pillow, and worst of all they took FRANCIS. Francis is my pet rock, whom I loved dearly. I can’t believe that they would use Francis to destroy my computer then throw him out the window. Francis fell into the highway and was pummeled by government officials’ cars. Please, take down this app. Justice for Francis!!!!!!!

attributes.title: MY WHOLE FAMILY NOW HAS CHLAMYDIA
attributes.review:
I downloaded this app to feed my inner racism and misogyny and it very much helped. But then my phone contracted the West Nile virus and gave it to my dog. So I put the my phone to my no no square and had a great time (which all trump supporters do) and then I contracted CHLAMYDIA. This really put a damper on the fun my sister and cousin were going to have later tonight (which all Trump supporters do on a regular basis) so this app TOTALLY BLOWS.
                                        - Barbz For Bernie

attributes.title: Worst app on any App Store
attributes.review: This app is extremely slow, it doesn’t like to work at all..... it kicks me off every time that I go onto it. Since I’ve gotten the app my phone hasn’t been working right. Sometimes I can turn on my phone at all it’s really annoying. I don’t recommend getting this app if you don’t want to buy a entire new phone. Please don’t waste your time on getting it!

attributes.title: I am so disappointed
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to see and support my king but when i opened it all i saw was a big fat orange blob of crap! i am so disappointed that i did not see my king Lee Gon. i am going back to the Kingdom of Corea and visiting the king so i can tell him how much i love him and admire him and his accomplishments. this app should be deleted because it gives you false information. the orange cheeto blob that this first shows IS NOT our king!!!
attributes.userName: d e s t i e l

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER DONT DOWNLOAD IT
attributes.review: THIS APP IS SO BAD when i opened it my dog and all of my fish died. also my whole family went deaf. NEVER DOWNLOAD IT. when i downloaded it i also stubbed my toe on the corner of a super sharp wall. my cousin died and so did my uncle. i couldn’t sleep all night and the next day a hawk came and ate my hamster. i almost fell off of a cliff too. DO NOT DOWNLOAD. i heard this stuff has been happening to a lot of other people when they downloaded the app so DO NOT DOWNLOAD THE APP.

attributes.title: HORRID
attributes.review: This app lags WAY too much for it to be even called an app. This so called “app” needs to be taken down IMMEDIATELY. Everytime i tried putting in my email, the entire app would kick me out. THIS APP IS MAKING ME BECOME A DEMOCRAT!!!! Awful experience. I dont recommend this awful app to anyone, also not to mention but trumps face is absolutely haunting. For the love of god don’t show that man on the app, my children are absolutely terrified of that orange in office!!! 😒

attributes.title: Do NOT recommend at ALL
attributes.review: Once I got it I noticed that there were a lot of my functions with my phone so I got rid of it and we got it and there was still more malfunctions so I got rid of it for a while and my phone was fine then I got again thinking it was fine and the glitching came back so I don’t recommend this app it is trash anyways especially since it’s owned by the annoying orange

attributes.title: Horrible.
attributes.review: I downloaded The app because I love my president right🥰🥰😍😍😘😘🍊. But then out of nowhere this giant cat attacked me as soon as I open the app. And I was so shocked like what did I do to deserve this🤬🙀🙀🙀🙀. I still have the cat marks on my face from the horrible things that cat did to me and when the cat left it said to me trump 2020🥳 like I was already gonna vote😰. But not no more not after what happen I am scarred for life. Don’t download this app🤯🤬🤬🥵🥵🥵.
